choose.when: INSERT INTO TBL_USER (ID, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_PHONE, USER_SCHOOL, USER_AGE, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, USER_LOGIN_CODE, USER_PROFILE_NAME) VALUES (#{id}, #{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{userPhone}, #{userSchool}, #{userAge}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{userLoginCode}, #{userProfileName})
choose.otherwise: INSERT INTO TBL_USER (ID, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_PASSWORD, USER_PHONE, USER_SCHOOL, USER_AGE, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, USER_LOGIN_CODE) VALUES (#{id}, #{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{userPassword}, #{userPhone}, #{userSchool}, #{userAge}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{userLoginCode})
